Summary: Looking through my cannon eos with a 55-250 lens saw a white object snapped about 30 stills.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my deck taking pics of the sky,as i was looking through my camera i noticed a shiny white object. Not sure if it came out of a cloud or just materialized. But when i did notice it i started snapping,i have about 30 stills of the object. This is not the first time i think i have this object recorded. In the middle of January i was having my roof replaced so i would go on the deck and take pics of them working. This time though i was using the movie function on the camera and had it on a tripod,i did not notice this one till i reviewed the couple minutes of footage.For about ten seconds it shows a very bright object moving between clouds decending. This time i was shocked to see it so well. Even thogh inthink if i was not looking through the camera i might have missed it entirely. For a couple of seconds it was in view,it moved like it was folding in on it self,also it moved very fast like zig zagging. As far as what i thought it maybe if you ever seen pics of the smaller so called energy orbs that you would get by taking pics in a cemetery. Been then i thought it would have to be the size of a 50 " tv. I have to say i was very excited and pleased that it showed itself to me, becouse it was cold and i would almost bet no one else in the valley was out taking pics. Finaly as how i lost sight of it from all the pics you could tell it rised higher in the sky and phased out. I just kept snapping until i couldn't see it any more. Thanks for listening ,and by chance you would like all thirty pics to see it how i did send an email and i would be happy to send all of them. Pretty amazing !
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Wilkes-Barre
There were no other sightings in Wilkes-Barre on or around February 18th 2013
